statements: UPDATE WaterConservation SET project_name='New Project Name', water_saved=500.25 WHERE project_id=1;
UPDATE WaterConservation SET project_location='Updated Location', start_date='2023-01-15' WHERE project_id=2;
UPDATE WaterConservation SET project_name = 'Water Conservation Project', project_location = 'City Center', water_saved = 125.75 WHERE project_id = 1
UPDATE WaterConservation SET end_date = '2023-08-31', start_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE project_id = 2
UPDATE WaterConservationEfforts SET water_saved_gallons = 500 WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE GreenTechnologyProjects SET technology_type = 'Renewable Energy' WHERE project_id = 2;
UPDATE WaterConservationEfforts SET project_name = 'Water Management Project', water_saved_gallons = 10000 WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE GreenTechnologyProjects SET project_description = 'New innovative green technology implementation', technology_type = 'Solar Energy' WHERE project_id = 2;
UPDATE WaterConservationProjects SET water_saved = 500.00 WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE Organizations SET phone_number = '+1-234-567-8901', email = 'contact@example.com' WHERE organization_id = 2;
UPDATE WaterConservationProjects SET water_saved = 5000.00, project_description = 'Implementing new water conservation techniques' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE Organizations SET contact_person = 'John Doe', phone_number = '+1-123-456-7890' WHERE organization_id = 2;
UPDATE WaterConservationProjects SET total_water_saved = 50000 WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE ProjectLocations SET city = 'New York', state = 'NY' WHERE project_id = 2;
UPDATE WaterConservationProjects SET total_water_saved = total_water_saved + 500 WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE ProjectParticipants SET role = 'Manager' WHERE project_id = 2 AND participant_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE water_conservation_projects SET project_name='Aqua Project' WHERE project_id=1
UPDATE project_members SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE member_id=2
UPDATE water_conservation_projects SET project_description = 'Project to reduce water usage by implementing water-saving techniques' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE project_members SET role = 'Team Lead' WHERE member_id = 3;
